thread.title: Impact: Steamy high heat Friday with scattered showers and thunderstorms.
thread.title_full: Impact: Steamy high heat Friday with scattered showers and thunderstorms.

author: Ethan Huston
title: Impact: Steamy high heat Friday with scattered showers and thunderstorms.
text:
Impact: Steamy high heat Friday with scattered showers and thunderstorms.
Temperatures rise to the lower 90s with feels-like temperatures peaking around 100ยบ during the afternoon. Scattered showers and storms are likely at times through the day Friday.
Temperatures rise to the lower 90s with feels-like temperatures peaking around 100ยบ during the afternoon. Scattered showers and storms are likely at times through the day Friday.
Temperatures rise to the lower 90s with feels-like temperatures peaking around 100ยบ during the afternoon. Scattered showers and storms are likely at times through the day Friday.
Tonight, partly cloudy skies are in store, with lows in the low 70s. Isolated showers and thunderstorms are possible.
Steamy weather continues Friday. A warm front will lift north in the morning, bringing a slight chance of thunderstorms. A few storms will develop later in the day, ahead of a slow-moving cold front. A Heat Advisory is in effect for Lancaster, York, Adams, Franklin, Cumberland, Dauphin, Perry, and Lebanon Counties from noon until 8 p.m. Friday. Don't forget to stay hydrated and take frequent breaks, if you work outdoors.
The cold front will drift east Saturday, leading to scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon and evening. Scattered storm chances continue Sunday. Highs will hover near 90 degrees this weekend.
Next week, temperatures remain above average, but may drop into the 80s by midweek.
